content.value: A thing I miss about virtual conferences is coordinating my shirt with my content. Since the focal length on my camera lens prevents me from showing off my shirt while I talk, here's a selfie. Come see me talk gatekeeping at #AllDayDevOps at 11:30pm Eastern!
